room_title: Escape room "Quarantine" by Escape Room Madness in New York
room_address: 38 West 32nd Street, Ste 500 New York, NY 10001
room_description: Dr. Semias Vexx has been exiled from the National Association of Science, a government program that creates cures for deadly viruses. Plotting his revenge, Dr. Vexx locks you in his laboratory, and plans to release his new deadly virus worldwide in the next hour, starting with the lab you’re locked in. Do you have what it takes to solve his puzzle room and escape, or will you be the cause of the Apocalypse?​
